RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: ExportAllSamples
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Export all samples from all instruments (using the sample name). You can choose to save flac or wav. V1.42: Fixed issue where samples were always saved as flac. V1.4: Fixed error with VST/midi instruments containing no samples.
Changes 1.3: Fixed renaming scheme. Add instrument numbers to folders. When instrument only contains one sample, only save sample and use instrument name as filename. Save all samples to one target folder.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: v.voois
